name: multi-channel-pipeline-src
description: Process 16 Channels of Video on Modalix Source Code

installation.post-message:
To run this package:

1. Build the project:
   mpk create -s . -d . --clean --board-type modalix

2. Connect to your DevKit:
   mpk device connect sima@<devkit-ip>

3. Deploy the package:
   mpk deploy -f pipeline-multichannel.mpk

4. Launch OptiView on the DevKit:
   optiview

5. Open OptiView Web UI from your host browser, find the pipeline, modify the RTSP source as needed, and run it.
   (On Windows use PowerShell)
